import React, { Component } from "react"; class CustomerSidebar extends Component { state = {}; toggleAdminFunctions = () => { let temp = this.state.toggleAdminFunctions; temp == 0 ? (temp = 1) : (temp = 0); this.setState({ toggleAdminFunctions: temp }); console.log(this.state.toggleAdminFunctions); }; toggleTenderManagement = () => { let temp = this.state.toggleTenderManagement; temp == 0 ? (temp = 1) : (temp = 0); this.setState({ toggleTenderManagement: temp }); }; render() { return (
this.props.onClick("dashboard")} > this.props.onClick("dashboard")} > this.props.onClick("dashboard")} > this.props.onClick("dashboard")} >
